definitions.definition: To give life to; to animate, make alive, revive.
To come back to life, receive life.
To take on a state of activity or vigour comparable to life; to be roused, excited.
Of a pregnant woman: to first feel the movements of the foetus, or reach the stage of pregnancy at which this takes place; of a foetus: to begin to move.
To make quicker; to hasten, speed up.

definitions.example: My heartbeat quickened when I heard him approach.

definitions.definition: To shorten the radius of (a curve); to make (a curve) sharper.
definitions.example: to quicken the sheer, that is, to make its curve more pronounced
